entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Fort McMurray
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 8:44 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.1°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: NW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
